Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: Non-inclusive bar. One side crowd and if you don't fit in from gender or age you will be escorted outside with the knowledge that it is a 'private party', yeah right. Bar visitors even come to you and say that you don't belong there.

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: A small dark place with a charisma of its own, the place is slightly Gothic style and give a vibe of being really dark (Metaphorically). The beer is good and the seating is unique. It is next to couple of very nice places but this gives them run for their money. I will recommend this place if you are around.

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: Cracking night club that is packed for a good night out. Close to Dam square it had two bars that serve a variety of drinks. The staff are nice and cordial and the crowd is quite good. The music depends on the day you go and they have a ‚Ä¶

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: A nice bar in downtown Amsterdam that had a pretty cool vibe to it. The music was pretty interesting but it wasn't my favourite. The drinks were priced reasonably. It was very very packed though and it is quite a small place. Give it a visit.

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: Great late night bar open till 4am. Great vibe with reasonable priced drinks for Amsterdam. Tiny smoking room but the street outside is busy human traffic atmosphere. 9/10 Late night drink

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: Bloemenbar at some point must have been one of the most popular late night establishments in Amsterdam. It's a has steady following patrons visiting well after 1 o'clock. Consisting for the better part of art students and other creative ‚Ä¶

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: I was in Bloemenbar a couple of weeks ago with two friends. There was a very dodgy atmosphere. We didn't feel our drinks were safe enough to drink, so we left.

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: Really nice people working there, groovy music, dancing space, normal prices... Such a good time!

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text: Great looking place, nice chilled crowd, shame about the rude bartender who didn't seem to even want my friends and I there. Don't recommend.

Name: Bloemenbar
Review Text:

Name: Bloemenbar
